title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore          Pick up a guide to the park's plants, animals, and seashells, explore the history of Cape Lookout, and find gifts to remember your visit at one of the two park bookstores:   Harkers Island Visitor Center Light Station Visitor Center   The park bookstores are maintained by Eastern National, a non-profit cooperating association, and part of each purchase provides funding for Cape Lookout National Seashore.      Want to buy a book before you get here? You can purchase a limited selection of items directly from the Eastern National website.         For more information, contact the bookstore at:         Cape Lookout National Seashore Eastern National Bookstore 131 Charles Street Harkers Island, NC 28531               (252) 728-2250 ext. 3006
